stochastic_function: lambda field_choice, exam_performance:{'positive': 0.6+0.1, 'neutral': 0.2, 'negative': 0.2-0.1} if field_choice == 'science' and exam_performance == 'excellent' else {'positive': 0.3+0.1, 'neutral': 0.4, 'negative': 0.3-0.1} if field_choice == 'science' and exam_performance == 'good' else {'positive': 0.1+0.1, 'neutral': 0.5, 'negative': 0.4-0.1} if field_choice == 'science' and exam_performance == 'average' else {'positive': 0.5+0.1/2, 'neutral': 0.3, 'negative': 0.2-0.1/2} if field_choice == 'arts' and exam_performance == 'excellent' else {'positive': 0.3+0.1/2, 'neutral': 0.4, 'negative': 0.3-0.1/2} if field_choice == 'arts' and exam_performance == 'good' else {'positive': 0.1+0.1/2, 'neutral': 0.5, 'negative': 0.4-0.1/2}
lambda job_prospects: {1: 0.8, 0: 0.2, -1: 0.0} if job_prospects == 'positive' else {1: 0.4, 0: 0.5, -1: 0.1} if job_prospects == 'neutral' else {1: 0.1, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.5}
